Description: A Clinic Medical Assistant provides support to healthcare professionals in a clinical setting.
A Community Health Worker is responsible for providing health education and support to individuals and families in the community.
A Physical Therapist evaluates and treats patients with physical impairments or disabilities. PTs help patients improve their mobility and restore physical function.
A Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner (PNP) is a licensed healthcare professional who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of mental health disorders.
